function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Effectiveness of N95 respirators compared to surgical masks in hospital setting","Impact":"Potential for inadequate protection against contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Ensure availability of N95 respirators in healthcare settings, and implement proper fit testing and training for healthcare workers","Technologies":"N95 respirators, fit testing technologies","People":"Healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of cloth masks compared to medical masks","Impact":"Potential for inadequate protection against contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide guidelines for proper use of cloth masks and ensure availability of medical masks for high-risk settings","Technologies":"Medical masks, guidelines for proper mask use","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government health agencies, employers"},{"Description":"Adequate PPE supply","Impact":"Potential shortage of personal protective equipment leading to increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Implement inventory monitoring protocols and supply chain management to ensure continuous availability of PPE","Technologies":"Inventory monitoring systems, supply chain management tools","People":"Healthcare workers, laboratory workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, laboratory facilities"}]}
